title: Esperando La Carroza
description: Cora has three sons and a daughter and she´s almost 80. One day during a family reunion the big question comes up: who will be her heir?

title: Mad Ron's Prevues from Hell
description: This collection cherry-picks trailers, forgotten scenes and poster art from 47 gory oldies, including Bay of Blood and The Blood Spattered Bride.

title: Murder Party
description: A mild-mannered office drone plucks a Halloween party invitation off the street and suddenly finds himself the main event at a "murder party."

title: Labyrinth
description: In Jim Henson's fantasy, teen Sarah embarks on a life-altering quest to rescue her little brother from the clutches of a treacherous goblin.

title: Logan's Run
description: In the 23rd century, inhabitants of a domed city exist in a world filled with life's pleasures – but no one is allowed to live past the age of 30.

title: The Car
description: In his small Southwestern town, sheriff Wade Parent must find out who — or what — is running people down via a mysterious, driverless black sedan.

title: Streets of Fire
description: Tough ex-soldier Tom Cody springs into action when a depraved motorcycle gang kidnaps his former girlfriend, Ellen, who's now a famous singer.

title: Hellboy
description: This fast-paced action flick tells the dark story of Hellboy, a charismatic demon who's put on Earth by the Nazis to terrorize the rest of the world.

title: Beavis and Butt-head Do America
description: After realizing that their boob tube is gone, Beavis and Butt-head set off on an expedition that takes them from Las Vegas to the nation's capital.

title: Killer Klowns from Outer Space
description: An alien band of killer clowns descends from the cosmos to harvest scores of small-town victims, cocooning their prey in cotton candy to eat later.

title: A Night at the Roxbury
description: After a run-in with Richard Grieco, dimwits Doug and Steve gain entry to a swanky nightclub in this comedy based on a "Saturday Night Live" sketch.

title: Kingpin
description: After a bowler loses his hand, his career takes a nosedive. That is, until he uncovers the next big thing: an Amish kid named Ishmael.

title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
description: Dreamy delivery girl Ramona captures Scott Pilgrim's heart, but he must vanquish all seven of her evil exes in martial arts battles to win her love.

title: Red Dawn
description: A group of teenagers witnesses Soviet and Cuban paratroopers descending on their small Colorado town and systematically setting off World War III.

title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
description: Hapless cop Frank Drebin causes more problems than he solves while trying to stop a deadly plot involving Queen Elizabeth II.

title: To Wong Foo, Thanks for Everything! Julie Newmar
description: Three New York drag queens on their way to Hollywood for a beauty pageant get stranded in a small Midwestern town when their car breaks down.

title: Mars Attacks!
description: As flying saucers head for Earth, the president of the United States prepares to welcome alien visitors but soon learns they're not coming in peace.

title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
description: After faking an illness to skip school, popular teen Ferris Bueller enjoys a fun-filled day in Chicago with his girlfriend and his uptight best friend.

title: Tremors
description: After a seismologist gets unusual readings on her equipment, handymen discover 30-foot-long carnivorous worms that suck their prey underground.

title: Battlefield Earth
description: In the year 3000, an alien race known as the Psychlos devastate planet Earth and force the surviving human population into slavery.

title: Paris Is Burning
description: This Sundance prize-winning documentary is an intimate portrait of 1980s Harlem drag balls: a world of fierce competition, sustenance, and survival.

title: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
description: Harold and Kumar jump on a plane to catch up with Harold's love interest but must change their plans when Kumar is accused of being a terrorist.

title: Harold & Kumar Go to White Castle
description: Buddies Harold and Kumar set out to satisfy a stoner craving for hamburgers but end up on an epic journey when they can't find White Castle.

title: Trainspotting
description: Renton and his mates cope with the gritty realities of heroin addiction. But when Renton gets clean, he can't get away from his friends' nasty habits.

title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back
description: Jay and Silent Bob's comic book alter egos have been sold to Hollywood without permission, so they head to Tinseltown to sabotage the production.

title: Spring Breakers
description: Four cash-strapped college women run afoul of the law — and fall in with a shady hustler — as they join the annual rite of bikinis, beer and debauchery.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: This stylized crime caper weaves together stories featuring a burger-loving hit man, his philosophical partner and a washed-up boxer.

title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre
description: When some friends visit a vandalized graveyard, they come upon a chainsaw-wielding maniac, and it's a fight to the bloody death between good and evil.

title: Kung Fu Hustle
description: Sing, a mobster in 1940s China, longs to be as cool as the formally clad Axe Gang, a band of killers who rule Hong Kong, but can only pretend.

title: Superbad
description: Hoping to have sex before college, high school seniors Seth and Evan try to score booze for a huge party, leading to a series of wild misadventures.

title: Mad Max
description: In a post-apocalyptic future, a malicious gang murders Max's family as an act of retaliation, forcing Max to hit the open road seeking vengeance.

title: The Five Venoms
description: A dying kung fu master sends his last student to track down five former pupils in order to learn which one of them has become evil.

title: The Crow
description: One year after Eric Draven and his fiancée are murdered, Draven – watched over by a hypnotic crow – returns from the grave to exact revenge.

title: Only God Forgives
description: When a cop kills the brother of an expat American gangster who runs a Bangkok fight club, his crime-boss mother flies in to supervise revenge.

title: Final Destination
description: After narrowly avoiding a fatal plane explosion, a group of seemingly lucky teen classmates finds that Death is not so easily cheated.

title: Stripes
description: After losing everything, an indolent sad sack impulsively joins the U.S. Army and cajoles his best friend into enlisting, too.

title: Blade Runner: The Final Cut
description: In a smog-choked dystopian Los Angeles, blade runner Rick Deckard is called out of retirement to snuff a quartet of escaped "replicants."

title: Cloud Atlas
description: In this star-studded drama, six seemingly disparate stories explore the complicated links that humanity shares through the generations.

title: House Party
description: Grounded by his strict father, Kid risks life and limb to go to his best friend Play's big bash but experiences one obstacle after another.

title: House Party 2
description: Kid goes off to college with scholarship money but when Play loses Kid's tuition funds to a shady music promoter, they devise a wild plan to raise cash.

title: Team America: World Police
description: In this musical satire, an all-marionette police force takes on the challenging role of keeping the peace on a troubled planet.

title: Snowpiercer
description: The Earth's remaining inhabitants are confined to a single train circling the globe as revolution brews among the class-divided cars.

title: Hostel: Part III
description: In this installment in the popular horror franchise, a bachelor party in Las Vegas turns into a hellish bloodbath for all involved.

title: Zoot Suit
description: In this drama based on a 1940s trial, the members of a Mexican American gang are sentenced to San Quentin for a murder they may not have committed.

title: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny
description: Dreaming of being a rock god, Midwesterner JB heads to California, where he crosses paths with idler KG – giving rise to the musical duo Tenacious D.

title: Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
description: A sportswriter and his Samoan lawyer embark on a hallucinogenic three-day romp from Los Angeles to Las Vegas in this counterculture cult favorite.

title: Tales From the Hood 2
description: Buckle up for an anthology of socially conscious horror stories that focus on the perils of racial injustice and the price of ignorance.

title: Monty Python's Life of Brian
description: Born in a stable in Judea, Brian grows up to join a group of anti-Roman zealots, but his fate keeps getting confused with that of a certain carpenter.

title: Trailer Park Boys: Countdown to Liquor Day
description: After their latest jail stint, boozy pals Julian, Bubbles and Ricky plan to go legit but learn trailer park manager Jim aims to demolish their homes.

title: Zodiac
description: A political cartoonist, a crime reporter and a pair of cops investigate San Francisco's infamous Zodiac Killer in this thriller based on a true story.

title: Candyman
description: Grad student Helen Lyle unintentionally summons the Candyman, a hook-handed creature made flesh by other people's belief in him.

title: Child's Play
description: When a rash of murders unfolds, 6-year-old Andy knows that his toy doll Chucky is the killer, but neither his mom nor the cops believe him.

title: Chasing Amy
description: Comic book artist Holden meets the perfect woman, only to learn that she's a lesbian. But that doesn't stop him from falling in love with her.

title: Carrie
description: An outcast teen with telekinetic ability lashes out with her deadly power when the high school "in crowd" torments her with a sick joke at the prom.

title: Trailer Park Boys: The Movie
description: In this feature-length adventure, Ricky, Julian and Bubbles – just out of jail – plan the lamest scheme yet: to get rich by stealing tons of change.

title: American Psycho
description: With chiseled good looks that belie his insanity, a businessman takes pathological pride in yuppie pursuits and indulges in sudden homicidal urges.

title: A Clockwork Orange
description: In this dark satire from director Stanley Kubrick, a young, vicious sociopath in a dystopian England undergoes an experimental rehabilitation therapy.

title: The Great Gambler
description: After unwittingly using his skills to obtain military secrets, a gambler is pursued by a police officer who happens to be his doppelgänger.

title: The Beast Stalker
description: Feeling guilty after a high-speed chase leaves a girl dead, a determined sergeant pursues the crime boss who triggered the fatal car accident.

title: Disco Dancer
description: A poor boy grows up to be a famous disco dancer, hoping to use his art to exact revenge on the millionaire who once framed him and his mother for theft.

title: Andaz Apna Apna
description: Broke and with no concrete plans for the future, two young men discover that a stunning heiress lives nearby and try to charm her into marriage.

title: Satte Pe Satta
description: The eldest of seven brothers who run a family farm together marries a pretty nurse, inspiring his country-bumpkin siblings to follow his example.

title: Legendary Weapons of China
description: Three assassins – magician Lei Ying, hit man Tieh Hon and kung fu master Ti Tan – are sent to Yunnan by their clan leader to bring to justice another clan member who betrayed the tribe.

title: Elaan
description: Journalist Naresh is hired to probe illegal activities on an island. When he's captured, a fellow prisoner gives him a ring with magic powers.

title: The Evil Dead
description: During a stop at a remote cabin deep within the woods, a group of teens begins turning into flesh-eating zombies in director Sam Raimi's cult classic.

title: Cheech & Chong's Still Smokin
description: Stoner comedians Cheech Marin and Tommy Chong arrive in Amsterdam to find they've been mistakenly invited, then take the stage live as a replacement act.

title: Esperando la carroza
description: Cora has three sons and a daughter and she´s almost 80. One day during a family reunion the big question comes up: who will be her heir?

title: Mindhorn
description: When a twisted killer tells the police he'll only speak to a fictional 1980s TV detective, the washed-up actor who played him takes the gig.

title: Trailer Park Boys: Say Goodnight to the Bad Guys
description: A year after the Season 7 finale, the boys are poised to live the good life. But an old enemy throws a wrench in things once again.

title: The Cruise
description: When the captain of a pleasant cruise ship mistakes a mischievous stowaway the entertainment director, wild and wacky hijinks ensue.

title: Pee-wee's Big Holiday
description: A chance encounter with a mysterious stranger (Joe Manganiello) points Pee-wee toward his destiny – and his first-ever holiday!
